attrs.label: Additional Content Security Policy (List of Strings)
attrs.description:
Additional Content Security Policy directives to add to the default CSP.</br>
These will be merged with the default CSP directives.</br>
Only add here directives/items that are not already present in the CSP File (/etc/opencloud/csp.yaml).</br>
If you notice a directive/item is missing that affects the core functionality of OpenCloud, </br>
or any of the integrations configured via this UI, please open an issue on GitHub.</br>
CSP keywords should be enclosed in single quotes.</br>
Example: `'unsafe-eval'`

attrs.label: Additional Content Security Policy (List of Objects)
attrs.description:
Additional Content Security Policy directives to add to the default CSP.</br>
These will be merged with the default CSP directives.</br>
Only add here directives/items that are not already present in the CSP File (/etc/opencloud/csp.yaml).</br>
If you notice a directive/item is missing that affects the core functionality of OpenCloud, </br>
or any of the integrations configured via this UI, please open an issue on GitHub.</br>
CSP keywords should be enclosed in single quotes.</br>
Example: `'unsafe-eval'`

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.
